definition: To cease to live; the act of losing one's life, typically used to describe the natural or intentional ending of a living organism's existence.

examples.german: Der alte Mann ist friedlich eingeschlafen und gestorben.
examples.english: The old man peacefully fell asleep and died.

examples.german: Die Pflanze ist abgestorben, weil sie kein Wasser bekommen hat.
examples.english: The plant died because it didn't receive any water.
